name: Royal Seal
description: A regal seal marked with the symbol of the lost kingdom's royalty. It opens locked doors and bestows authority upon the bearer.
usage: Unlocks a mysterious door deep within the kingdom.

name: Elixer of Restoration
description: A vial containing a glowing liquid that heals wounds and restores strength. The effects are immediate upon consumption.

name: Shadow Cloak
description: A cloak woven from the shadows of night. When worn, the user is rendered invisible to enemies.
usage: Allows the user to avoid one combat initiation.

name: Ancient Amulet of Binding
description: A shimmering amulet said to posses the power to bind spirits and entities. It glows with a faint ethereal light.
usage: Allows the user to release the spirit from the crystal Ball.

name: Royal Crown Piece
description: a magnificent artifact that once adorned the head of the revered rulers of the kingdom, but it's not complete.
usage: When all four pieces are collected and returned to the throne room, the prophecy will be complete with a new ruler at the reigns over the kingdom.
